item.title: Davinci Resolve Linux Resources
item.description: Table of Contents Link to heading Installation Debugging Alternate Installation Method H264/H265/AAC Codec Workaround FFMPEG Conversion Smart Folders with Incron Transcode Footage While Editing With Macro Exporting videos with AAC Plugin Magic Byte Codes Your GPU Memory is Full + Blank Video Screen on Linux Can’t Move or Maximize Resolve Window Nvidia GPU Installation Arch Specific Other Resources Installation Link to heading Go to resolve’s official site to download and run their installer.
